meanings.definition: A salt or ester of dithiocarbamic acid.
meanings.sent1: I added a dithiocarbamate to the solution for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of various dithiocarbamates.
meanings.sent3: The dithiocarbamate walked into the lab and said, 'I'm feeling salty today!'
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a dithiocarbamate, complex yet fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The dithiocarbamate compound sparkled under the microscope, revealing its intricate structure.

meanings.definition: Any compound containing the dithiocarbamate group.
meanings.sent1: The new pesticide is made up of dithiocarbamates to protect the crops.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use dithiocarbamate-based chemicals to control pests effectively.
meanings.sent3: The dithiocarbamate group gathered for a party in the chemical flask.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of chemistry, dithiocarbamates bloomed like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The smell of dithiocarbamate filled the air, signaling the success of the experiment.
